title: Unchained Melody
lyrics:
[intro, ternary strum] (D)
 
(D)Woh, my-(Bm)yy looove, my (G) daaarling
I've (A)hungered for (D)yooour touch
A (Bm)long, lonely (A)time (A)
 
And (D)time go-(Bm)oes byyy so (G) slooowlyyy
And (A)time… can do (D)sooo much
Aaare (Bm) you… still (A)mi-(A)iiine
 
(D)I need your love (A)    
(Bm)I (F#m)need your love
(G)God… speed your love (A)to-ooo (D)me (D7)
  
[bridge]
(G)Lonely rivers (A)flow, to the (G)sea, to the (F)sea
(G)To the open (A)arms, of the (D)sea-eaaa (yeah-eah)
(G)Lonely rivers (A)sigh, wait for (G)me, wait for (F)me
(G)I'll be coming (A)home, wait for (D) me
    
[strum]
(D)Woh, my-(Bm)yy looove, my (G) daaarling,
I've (A)hungered, hungered for (D)your tooouch
Aaa (Bm)long, lonely (A)time (A)
 
And (D)tiiime go-(Bm)oes by so (G) slooowlyyy
And (A)time can do… (D)sooo much
Aaare (Bm) you… still (A)mine
 
I-(D)I need your (A)love     
(Bm)I (F#m)need your love
God… (G)speed your love (A)to-ooo (D)me   
(Bm)  (G-Gm)  (D) [end]
